name: Lockdown Thief
description:
LOCKDOWN THIEFBased on the current pandemic, you must abide the rules which are present inside of shops and steal the things which are on your shopping list in the correct order as well as staying 2 metres apart and not getting caught. Can you do it ?
  •  wasd - move
  •  e - bottom shelf pickup
  •  q - top shelf pickup

Credits

  • Programming - @mysticgamedev 
  • Art - @_a.g.art
